headline: More than 200 S&P 500 companies scrubbed 'diversity' and 'equity' from annual reports in 2025
summary: More than 200 S&P 500 companies scrubbed words such as 'diversity' and 'equity' from their annual reports in 2025, according to a new report from Freshfields, reinforcing a widening corporate retreat from DEI.
